meanings.sent1: The pond was full of tiny froglets hopping around.
meanings.sent2: The biologist studied the froglets in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The froglets had a race to see who could reach the lily pad first.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was filled with eager froglets ready to learn.
meanings.sent5: The children watched in amazement as the froglets transformed into adult frogs.

meanings.sent1: The garden was teeming with colorful froglets after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The froglets croaked softly in the moonlit night.
meanings.sent3: The froglets gathered by the stream for a midnight feast.
meanings.sent4: The tiny froglets leaped gracefully from one lily pad to another.
meanings.sent5: The pond sparkled with the presence of the delicate froglets.
